abstract: Nissan reports to National Highway Traffic Safety Admin that it is recalling up to 640,000 vehicles due to defect that causes fire hazard.
lead_paragraph: The carmaker’s actions, which cover 640,000 vehicles, came on the same day as smaller recalls by Toyota and Ford.
snippet: The carmaker’s actions, which cover 640,000 vehicles, came on the same day as smaller recalls by Toyota and Ford.

headline.main: Faulty Hood and Fire Hazard Lead to Twin Recalls for Nissan
headline.print_headline: New Recalls by Nissan, for Rogue and Other S.U.V.s
